public final class SideFrontGold extends SideFront
Represents a side of a Gold card.

  • Constructor Details

    • SideFrontGold

      public SideFrontGold(int id, SideFieldRepresentation fieldRepresentation, ResourceHolder resources, int associatedScore, Symbol multiplier, ResourceHolder requirements, Symbol color)
      Constructs a new SideFrontGold object with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier for the side.
      fieldRepresentation - The representation of the side's field.
      resources - The resources associated with the side.
      associatedScore - The score associated with the side.
      multiplier - The symbol that multiplies the score.
      requirements - The resource requirements needed to place this side on the field.
      color - The color of the side.
